description:
How fast do you type on your phone? Download this free typing test to quickly find out. Fast, accurate typing is a key factor in being able to use your smartphone effectively. The Two Thumbs Up Typing Test is simple one minute test that is the best and most accurate way to measure your current typing speed. Take it as often as you like. 
Until Labor Day, Sept. 6th, 2010, the Two Thumbs Up Typing Test (TTUTTest) will also contain a short typing survey and contest you can optionally enter. Prizes will be awarded to the fastest typists. Prizes will also be awarded to winners of a random drawing from all participants. Survey results will be made public on Sierra Blanco’s website shortly after the contest/survey ends. Survey data will be graphed showing typing speed by age and other survey items. Sierra Blanco’s website will also have a leader board showing the 100 fastest typists.
TTUTTest also provides additional information about Sierra Blanco’s Two Thumbs Up Typing Tutor which is also available in Palm’s Application catalog. It is very reasonably priced and can systematically teach you to become a better thumb typist.
